Package com.ibm.eznosql.options

Class DatabaseOptions.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.eznosql.options.DatabaseOptions.Builder
Enclosing class:
DatabaseOptions
public static class DatabaseOptions.Builder extends Object
Fields can be optionally assigned with corresponding 'set' methods. Returns a DatabaseOptions instance upon invoking build().

The following is a usage example:
DatabaseOptions options = new DatabaseOptions.Builder("storageClass").setMaxSpace(20).build();

  • Method Details

    • setMaxSpace

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setMaxSpace(int maxSpace)
      Optional setter method for maxSpace.
      Parameters:
      maxSpace - An integer value that specifies the maximum size for the database in MB.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setAvgDocSize

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setAvgDocSize(int avgDocSize)
      Optional setter method for average document size.
      Parameters:
      avgDocSize - An integer value that specifies the average size of all documents in the database in MB.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setUpdatePercent

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setUpdatePercent(int updatePercent)
      Optional setter method for update percentage.
      Parameters:
      updatePercent - An integer value that specifies the percentage of update requests compared to insertion and deletion requests.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setLogOptions

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setLogOptions(LogOptions logOption)
      Optional setter method for LogOptions.
      Parameters:
      logOption - An Enum that represent database recoverability options non-recoverable.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setMgmtClas

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setMgmtClas(String mgmtClass)
      Optional setter method for an SMS Management Class.
      Parameters:
      mgmtClass - The Management Class name.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setDataClas

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setDataClas(String dataClass)
      Optional setter method for an SMS-managed Data Class.
      Parameters:
      dataClass - The Data Class name.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • setLogStreamId

      public DatabaseOptions.Builder setLogStreamId(String logStreamId)
      Optional setter method for a Log stream ID; Note that a valid logStream ID must be set if a recoverable database is defined with LogOptions.ALL.
      Parameters:
      logStreamId - The Log Stream ID.
      Returns:
      A Builder instance.

    • build

      public DatabaseOptions build() throws IllegalStateException
      Validates and builds a DatabaseOptions instance from the current state of the Builder. If no options are set, the Builder will use default values (maxSpace = 10, avgDocSize = 1, updatePercent = 5, logOptions = NONE).
      Returns:
      A DatabaseOptions instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If any set options are invalid or ill-formatted.
